channel.title: Forum of Lies 4 (BR and Serpent "Win")(We don't count this one)
channel.description:
##Welcome Game Masters @Queen_Alfa and @FadeBlade
**Timer** https://www.piliapp.com/timer/countdown/
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game (from Rule #1)
**Gameplay**
* Days will be 4 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long * Actions are done by messaging me * Black Rose/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server * All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it * when performing a vote or a action make sure it is bold so finding it is easier otherwise the action won't be counted. to bold words just do this ** Words ** (no space with the ****) * When The King is killed those who have royal blood can say **The Throne Will Be mine** to step up to become the king if no one else steps up the king is chosen. if someone else steps up voting for the next king will begin, for the next 24 hours people can vote who they want king. after the 1st 24 hours if no king is chosen anyone can step up
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they may speak to defence other players are still able to talk during this time at anypoint during the trial the King can choose to allow or veto the vote Executions end the Day Trials will end when majority is reached or the day has ended
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed **Day:** You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Any[/color]**
Players: 1. Moleland - [color=steblue]The Good King[/color] - Dead 2. Damafaud [color=lightgrey]The Spiritualist[/color] - Dead 3. Frostwolf103 [color=purple]The Assassin[/color] - Dead 4. JammySplodge - [color=steblue]The Good Queen[/color] 5. Hippolytus- Alive 6. orangeandblack5 - Alive 7. PokemonKidRyan - Alive 8. tardispaten - [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] - Dead 9. Rogue [color=steblue]The Sheriff[/color] - Dead 10. gingerbeardgentleman - Alive 11. Bob - [color=purple]The Evil King[/color] - Dead 12. numberFTW [color=gold]The Greedy[/color] - Dead 13. deadfrien [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] - Dead 14. PolikShadowbliss [color=steblue]The Princess[/color] - Dead 15. yauaustin202 - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] - Dead 16. CaptainNerbins - Alive

item.title: Forum of Lies 4 (BR and Serpent "Win")(We don't count this one)
item.dc:creator: gingerbeardgentleman
item.description:
@Moleland

The deal in which I agreed to lynch you for a confession from PKR was my idea, actually, not scums.

  • I figured there was roughly a 35% chance dama was in you, a 20% chance he was in me, and a 45% chance he was
    in someone else.

  • to get a confession out of PKR.

  • For the lolz, and

because, assuming MM could be executed in jail and no bad votes the next day,(my bad) the ONLY way BD could have lost that was if ALL of these conditions were met:

  • Orange was NK

  • dama was NOT in you.

  • Jammy had NOT stepped forward to be king, and

  • Orange and dama had killed two different BD the following night.

in any case, these reasons weren’t sufficient to execute you, and again I’m sorry about that.

I’m going to take a time-out and think upon my sins (also am transitioning to a new city and job) so you guys have fun in FoL 5. I’ll probably be back later.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum of Lies 4 (BR and Serpent "Win")(We don't count this one)

item.title: Forum of Lies 4 (BR and Serpent "Win")(We don't count this one)
item.dc:creator: gingerbeardgentleman
item.description:
so, I’m going to respond to a few remarks on here. Prepare for a text wall.

@orangeandblack5, we actually were better off with king!Jammy than king!PKR.

at that point,immediately after Moleland was lynched, there were still 7 players in the game, and we more or less knew what everyone was. There were 4 BD, 2 BR, and you, the neutral. Dama was also still in play. It’s worth noting that we didn’t know what you were and had no way of knowing, so we had to assume you were an NK at that point. After all, you had been roleblocked the first two nights, and the two deaths on n3 could have been any combination of you, dama, and PKR.

If king!PKR, BD would lose two players at most, one from you, one from dama, and still have two BD left. I assumed hippo would be dead, and that you would be dead. (quick note here: I’m still somewhat to blame for the poison and prison execution mishaps; I didn’t bother to check with the hosts about whether or not they worked. I just assumed they did)

That leaves three players, two BD and PKR, and PKR would have been able to use his finger since only two votes are needed at that point to vote someone up. Something tells me that PKR would have been hovering over the keyboard when the night timer ended.

if King!Jammy, on the other hand, BD has 3 players die in the night in worst case scenario (PKR still assasin), leaving Jammy, who would have guarded, and PKR. Jammy has the finger; game over for BR.

Furthermore, of course I deviated from the plan to execute hippolytus. The plan that was in place called for me jailing and probably executing PKR.

We all had good reason to suspect that PKR was psychic turned illusionist, and the mastermind/assasin was the higher priority target. I didn’t know when I selected to jail hippo whether frost would flip MM, assasin, or illusionist. That’s why I kept insisting that the court wizards guard me rather than target each other. I couldn’t let deadfrien know that hippo would be jailed on the chance she turned out to be BR. I also hadn’t sussed out that you couldn’t possibly be any of the known BR roles at the time, so I figured the BR could possibly be you, deadfrien, and frost.

Read full topic
